DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study develop evaluate adaptive shape intervention base Behavioral Economics Operant principle promote physical activity behavior ( adaptive group ) compare static physical activity intervention ( static group ) use two-group randomize controlled trial design . Participants include 20 overweight men woman ( BMI 25-35 kg/m2 ) 18 55 year . Both group receive follow component : 1 ) pedometer , 2 ) self-monitoring physical activity , 3 ) brief educational material , 4 ) motivational prompt , 5 ) physical activity goal , 6 ) small financial incentive . The Adaptive Intervention ( AI ) group receive adaptive goal feedback base percentile `` move '' window recent physical activity , incentive link goal attainment . Comparison intervention participant receive static 10,000 step per day goal , match incentive amount without incentive link goal attainment . The study compare difference goal set shape procedure aim increase physical activity behavior . Primary aim include : 1 . To determine whether physical activity ( pedometer-measured steps/day ) Adaptive Static intervention increase compare respective baseline . Hypothesis : Both adaptive static intervention result increased physical activity 6 month . 2 . To evaluate whether Adaptive Intervention result great change physical activity ( pedometer-measured steps/day ) compare Static Intervention . Hypothesis : The adaptive intervention result significantly great physical activity , measure pedometer , compare static intervention 6 month . 3 . To assess participant ' satisfaction overall program . Hypothesis : Adaptive Intervention participant report great overall satisfaction intervention Static Intervention participant .
DOC.brief_title: An Adaptive Physical Activity Intervention Overweight Adults
DOC.criteria: 1 . Live San Diego County . 2 . Be 18 55 year old . 3 . Currently exceed 1,000 METminutes per week physical activity determine International Physical Activity Questionnaire ( IPAQ short form ) . 4 . Not suffer medical condition take medication ( ) would prohibit one adopt moderate intensity physical activity program . 5 . Have body mass index 25 35 kg/m2 . 6 . Not currently pregnant . 7 . Familiar email access email internet daily , 8 . Not plan leave San Diego County 10 day next 6 month . 9 . Not plan move away San Diego County next 6 month . 10 . Potential participant must access Microsoft Windows ( XP , Vista , windows 7 ) daily basis . If , would need daily access use Windows virtualization software ( e.g . Parallels , VMware ) Apple operate system . 1 . Does live Dan Diego . 2 . Individuals age 18 55 . 3 . Those exceed 1,000 metminutes physical activity per week determine International Physical Activity Questionnaire ( IPAQ short form ) . 4 . Suffering medical condition take medication prohibit one adopt moderate intensity physical activity program . 5 . Does BMI 25 35 kg/m2 . 6 . Currently Pregnant . 7 . Does access Microsoft Windows Windows virtualization software Apple operating system .
